# Generating submission file

```{r}
utils.submission = function (data) {
  submissionFrame <- data.frame(
    "id" = data$id,
    "median_house_value" = data$id
  )
  write.csv(submissionFrame, submissionFilePath, row.names = FALSE)
}
```

```{r}
utils.submission(testData)
```
